creator: Raise Financial Services
descriptionHtml:
Dhan is a Product & Technology led Stock Trading app built to give a superior experience to both Super Traders and long-term investors. Dhan stock investing mobile app allows you to instantly open a Demat & Trading account on exchanges like BSE, NSE, and MCX. It is a Fast, Simple, Secure and Transparent mobile trading app for investing in Equities, ETFs, Futures, Options, Currencies, Commodities and also IPOs.

Download the Dhan Stock Broking app and start trading with a superior experience at industry standard prices. 📈

Here's why you should open an account on the Dhan stock trading app ✅
→ 100% paperless onboarding process
→ Super Fast KYC, start trading in no time
→ Better investing & trading experience, built grounds up.

Dhan stock investing app is a direct market investment platform that allows you to trade on NSE, BSE, and MCX. You can trade and invest in Equities, ETFs, Commodities, Currencies, Futures, and Options. Dhan share market investing app is built to give you a pro experience to traders & long term investors. Here are some of our super features to help you trade better & faster 👇

Features for traders 📊
✔ ChartIQ & Trading View Charts: You can trade faster and better with real-time charts which have highly advanced & interactive features
✔ Technical Indicators : Get access to 100+ indicators to profit from stocks, currencies, futures & options
✔ Market Data: You can see offers/asks for a security on our stock trading app
✔ Bracket Orders: Easily square off a favourable position by the end of the trading session
✔ Cover Orders: Advanced Intraday order with compulsory stop loss order to safeguard yourself in unexpected market movements
✔ Brokerage Calculator: Dhan's Brokerage Calculator helps you in calculating the brokerage amount you need to pay for your NSE, BSE & MCX Trades
✔ Square Off at 3:20 PM: If you have open Intraday positions & not squared off at the closing time then, it will automatically closed down at 3:20 PM

Features for Investors ⌛
✔ Company Fundamentals: Get detailed qualitative & quantitative insights on listed share market companies to understand their underlying business performance
✔ Watchlist: You can build your customised watchlists & track up to 250 stocks across 5 watchlists
✔ Price Alerts: Get instant alerts when a stock crosses the price or volume you specify
✔ SIP in Stocks: SIP in stocks allows you to fix either the amount to be invested or the number of shares needed to be purchased at a regular interval
✔ IPO: Participate in Initial Public Offering of private companies getting listed in the share market
✔ After Market orders: Place buy / sell orders for the next trading day after the share market has closed
✔ Basket Orders: Create multiple orders for same or different stocks & club these orders together to be placed in a single go
✔ Forever or Good till cancel orders: Place an order which remains in brokers trading system until it get executed, cancelled manually or order expiry date reaches

Trade without worrying ✅
→ For delivery trades, get lifetime free trading. Zero brokerage on delivery orders
→ For Intraday trades, we charge a flat fee of Rs. 20/- per order

At Dhan, Your Privacy comes First
✔ Your data is always securely transmitted to our servers and not shared with anyone.
✔ Rest assured, we never share your personal information with any third party and all your data belongs to you
✔ Dhan is a regulated financial services platform, operating under the regulations & guidelines of SEBI & Stock Exchanges.

Join our community to be a part of our beta programs & be updated on new feature launch: https://community.dhan.co/

📥 If you have any queries mail us at help@dhan.co
👋 Please share your valuable feedback at feedback@dhan.co

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We thought we would make a grand entry like Shahrukh, but things didn't go as per script.
Had some bugs, they don't exist any more.
- Onboarding is much faster
- Your last order type is saved, and auto-selected for the next time
- IPO more visible, missed this completely. Sorry!

Talking about blockbuster debuts, Freshworks got listed on Nasdaq. A bit special for us because we are proud customers of Freshworks & Girish is an investor in Raise Financial Services. Raising the bar, Yay!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Two things are making news - Squid Game on Netflix and Customer Experience on Dhan. We can only claim involvement in the 2nd one :)
With your feedback coming in fast, bugs are moving out faster. Here's what we shipped out -

Track 500 stocks - Create 10 watchlists with 50 stocks in each
IPO - Upcoming IPOs now directly available on the dashboard, just tap & apply
Futures & Options - Upfront market watch, easy charts selection for analysis
In app banners - Keep you updated on what's new with us.

title: Dhan - Stock Market Trading & Investing for India

creator: Raise Financial Services
descriptionHtml:
Dhan is a product & technology led stock market investing and trading app built to give a superior experience to both Super Traders and Long-Term Investors.

With Dhan, investing in Stocks, ETFs, Futures, Options, Currencies, Commodities and IPOs is Simple, Fast, Secure and Transparent.
Dhan stock trading and investing app allows you to instantly open a Demat & Trading account on exchanges like BSE, NSE, and MCX.

Explore it all at Free Prices 💸
→ Zero Account Opening Fees
→ Zero AMC for Trading or Demat Account
→ Zero Platform Fees
→ Zero Charges for delivery based trades. Yes, absolutely free!
→ Rs. 20/- per order for intraday trades

Dhan is built with Lightining Fast Experience ⚡
✔ Invest in stocks of the companies you love, admire or follow.
✔ Apply for IPOs and be part of the journey from listing.
✔ Trade in options to take advantage of both moves in the market.
✔ Form a view about the market and trade in futures with conviction.
✔ Gain from fluctuations in exchange rates by trading in currencies.
✔ Diversify your investment opportunities by trading in commodities.
✔ Capitalize on short-term market movements by investing in ETFs.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
For years, investing has been a solo lonely effort. We believe the real fun is with friends & family.
Introducing Referral Rewards:
You will receive up to INR 250 for every friend who joins Dhan with your referral and trades. Imagine if all your friends start investing regularly - there’s no limit to the rewards you will receive & you can pat yourself on the back for introducing them to the world of investing!
P.S. Lot of updates shipped in Options, SIPs, IPO and Payments. Can you spot them?

descriptionShort: Dhan makes share market investing & trading on mobile fast and easy.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
For years, investing has been a solo lonely effort. We believe the real fun is with friends & family.
Introducing Referral Rewards:
You will receive up to INR 250 for every friend who joins Dhan with your referral and trades. Imagine if all your friends start investing regularly - there’s no limit to the rewards you will receive & you can pat yourself on the back for introducing them to the world of investing!
P.S. Lot of updates shipped in Options, SIPs, IPO and Payments. Can you spot them?

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
UPI achieved a huge milestone last month, it processed transactions > $100 Bn. Over 80% of Dhan users prefer UPI to add money! So we enabled two awesome things - link upto 5 Bank accounts to Dhan, and also connect multiple UPI handles for a single bank account. Btw, we hope you know that with Smart Transfer you can add up to 99.99 Lacs in a single transaction.
What else? Open your Dhan app now every morning by 8:00 AM for a surprise!

SIP in Stocks: SIP in stocks allows you to fix either the amount to be invested or the number of shares needed to be purchased at a regular interval
IPO: Participate in Initial Public Offering of private companies getting listed in the share market
After Market orders: Place buy / sell orders for the next trading day after the share market has closed
Basket Orders: Create multiple orders for same or different stocks & club these orders together to be placed in a single go
Forever or Good till cancel orders: Place an order which remains in brokers trading system until it get executed, cancelled manually or order expiry date reaches

Features for Super-Traders
ChartIQ & Trading View Charts: You can trade faster and better with real-time charts which have highly advanced & interactive features
Trade from Charts: You can trade directly from TradingView charts
Technical Indicators : Get access to 100+ indicators to profit from stocks, currencies, F&O
Market Data: You can see offers/asks for a security on our stock trading app
Bracket Orders: Easily square off a favourable position by the end of the trading session
Cover Orders: Advanced Intraday order with compulsory stop loss order to safeguard yourself in unexpected stock market movements
Brokerage Calculator: Calculate the brokerage amount you need to pay for your NSE, BSE & MCX Trades
Square Off at 3:20 PM: If you have open Intraday positions & not squared off at the closing time then, it will automatically closed down at 3:20 PM

At Dhan, Your Privacy is our Top Priority
Your data is always securely transmitted to our servers and not shared with anyone.
Rest assured, we never share your personal information with any third party and all your data belongs to you
Dhan is a regulated stock broking platform, operating under the regulations & guidelines of SEBI & Stock Exchanges.

Download the Dhan trading app and be a part of lightning fast investing journey

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Stock markets are a skill of time. Fastest Fingers First.

Whenever you try to sell your stock, you have to authenticate the transaction with an OTP.

You lose precious seconds here and the you might not get to sell at your preferred price.

Now, you'll get to authenticate all transaction even before you think of selling!

Wondering how we cracked this? Update your app to find out.

More:
1. Greeks tab (for our Options lovers)
2. A more transparent margin summary
3. AMO at pre-Open

title: Dhan: Share Market Trading App

creator: Raise Financial Services
descriptionHtml:
Dhan is an online share market investing & trading app to invest in Stocks, Futures, Options, Commodities, Currencies, ETFs and IPO.

⚡ Start Investing in stock market at Zero Cost

✔️ ₹0 Demat Account Fees
✔️ ₹0 AMC
✔️ ₹0 Platform Fees
✔️ ₹0 Brokerage for Delivery Trades
✔️ ₹20 per order for Intraday Trades

👩 ₹10 per order for Intraday and F&O Trades for all women investor on Dhan

⚒️ Industry first features coupled with awesome customer service experience, Dhan is one of the most sought after stock market app.

📱 Dhan stock broking app is built to give a pro experience for Super Traders & Long-Term Investors.

📈 Traders love stock trading on Dhan for awesome features like:

1️⃣ Trade directly from TradingView charts (tv.dhan.co)
2️⃣ Get Instant Margin Benefits by pledging shares
3️⃣ Manage Risk in detail and add stop loss to open position
4️⃣ Identify key price levels and set up support and resistance with Daily & Weekly CPR indicators
5️⃣ Reverse Position in 1 tap and save brokerage
6️⃣ Calculate the brokerage before placing the order with Transaction Estimator
7️⃣ Get enhanced Options Chain with weekly and monthly expiries for all stocks and indices

💰 Investors love stock investing on Dhan because they can:

1️⃣ Get Qualitative & Quantitative insights 📝 on listed share market companies
2️⃣ Track the performance 🧐 of invested stocks and View Returns by XIRR & CAGR
3️⃣ Get instant alerts when a stock crosses the price or volume they specify with Price Alerts
4️⃣ Invest systematically and regularly via SIP in stocks
5️⃣ Benchmark and track their returns with 12 major Indices in Indian stock market with Alphaview
6️⃣ Place buy / sell orders for the next trading day after the share market has closed with After Market Orders
7️⃣ Create multiple orders for same or different stocks & club them together in a single go with Basket Orders
8️⃣ Place an Forever or Good till Triggered orders in their trading system until it get executed

👉🏼 Why open Demat Account & Trading Account with Dhan?

✔️ Digital Demat Account Opening
✔️ 100% Paperless KYC in just 10 mins
✔️ 24/7 Customer Support on Chat and Call. We are pretty sure that we are one of the fastest ⚡ in the industry!

👮 At Dhan, Your Privacy is our Top Priority

✔️ Your data is always securely transmitted to our servers and not shared with anyone.
✔️ Rest assured, we never share your personal information with any third party and all your data belongs to you
✔️ Dhan is a regulated stock broking platform, operating under the regulations & guidelines of SEBI & Stock Exchanges.

Dhan is an online trading and stock investing app from where you can invest in all the segments - Stocks, Futures, Options, Commodities, Currencies, ETFs and IPO. With many industry first features you can make informed decisions. If you perform technical analysis, you can do share trading directly on the TradingView charts. And if you’re a long term investor, features like Daily SIP is going to help you in investing your favourite stocks faster and easily. With a strong tech product, and awesome customer service, Dhan stock trading app is going to upgrade your online trading experience.

1,00,000+ users have switched to our trading app and are enjoying Lightning Fast Investing Experience, what are you waiting for?

Download the Dhan stock broking & share trading app get ready to invest and trade smartly.

To know more about our share market app visit https://dhan.co/

title: Dhan: Stock Market Trading App

creator: Raise Financial Services
descriptionHtml:
🤩 More than 2.5 lakh users love to trade & invest in share market with Dhan! You too can join Dhan and trade stocks online with awesome features. Open your free demat account today in less than 10 minutes #MadeForTrade⚡

🏆 Best-in-Class Stock Trading Solution - Global Fintech 2022
🏆 Most Reliable Tech 2022 - TradingView

This Makes Dhan the Best Online Stock Market Trading Platform

🏅 We listen to our users & ensure that they have access to the best product & customer experience on Dhan app for share trading
🏅 Every feature we release on our stock market app is built for Super Traders & Long-Term Investors

F&O Stocks Trading

🔥 Trade Options & Futures directly from TradingView Charts on Dhan
🔥 Get margin benefit for options buying & selling
🔥 Start trading calls & puts from the Advanced Option Chain

Intraday Trading

🚀 Get 5x leverage for 850+ stocks on our intraday trading platform
🚀 Execute multiple online intraday trading strategies in one go with Basket Orders
🚀 Trade stocks online with one-tap reverse/exit positions

Commodity & Currency Trading

🔥 Use one Dhan account to trade in all segments, including Commodity & Currency
🔥 Instant pledge margin benefit on 1450+ stocks for trading Commodity online
🔥 Trade Commodity & Currency F&O from charts using Dhan’s online trading platform

Investing in Stocks & ETFs

💰 Buy stocks & ETFs for the long term with Zero Brokerage on delivery orders
💰 Mark long-term online investments & get a friendly reminder to reconsider when you try to sell them
💰 4x leverage on 950+ stocks with Margin Funding
💰 Start online investing with daily, weekly, & monthly SIPs

Cool Features for Online Trading

🆕 Enable DDPI to sell your share market holdings quickly without OTP or T-PIN
🆕 For the first time in India - place orders directly from TradingView using Dhan
🆕 Manage risk with Trader’s Control - set alerts for loss & overtrading
🆕 Invite your friends to use the Dhan trading app with a simple QR code scan
😎 Trade in Nifty 50 F&O with real-time stock market live charts
😎 Build on your own with DhanHQ trading APIs
😎 Elevate your online investment experience with Draft Orders, Managed smallcases, & much more
😎 Transfer funds from Dhan investing app to your bank account in minutes!

Pricing

🟢 Demat account opening at zero cost😎
🟢 No AMC or platform fees (for life)
🟢 Rs. 0 for Equity, ETF, & IPO delivery
🟢 Rs. 20 or 0.03% (whichever lower) on Equity Intraday & Futures for All Segments
🟢 Rs. 20 on Options for All Segments

Fund Transfer

💵 You can use UPI to fund your trading account at no cost
💵 Transfer funds using Netbanking/IMPS to invest in stock market

Gems on Dhan

💎 Earn referral rewards for life once your friends & family start trading
💎 Get 24*7 support from Dhan when you have queries
💎 All of us are involved in resolving your queries, including our CEO 😄
💎 Engage with other users, request features, & do more on the Dhan community

Questions or feedback? Mail us: help@dhan.co

Want to know more? Visit: https://dhan.co/

Investing in Stocks & ETFs



💰 Buy stocks & ETFs for the long term with Zero Brokerage on delivery orders
💰 Mark long-term online investments & get a friendly reminder to reconsider when you try to sell them
💰 4x leverage on 950+ stocks with Margin Funding
💰 Start online investing with daily, weekly, & monthly SIPs

Cool Features for Online Trading



🆕 Enable DDPI to sell your share market holdings quickly without OTP or T-PIN
🆕 For the first time in India - place orders directly from TradingView using Dhan
🆕 Manage risk with Trader’s Control - set alerts for loss & overtrading
🆕 Invite your friends to use the Dhan trading app with a simple QR code scan
😎 Trade in Nifty 50 F&O with real-time stock market live charts
😎 Build on your own with DhanHQ trading APIs
😎 Elevate your online investment experience with Draft Orders, Managed smallcases, & much more
😎 Transfer funds from Dhan investing app to your bank account in minutes!

Pricing



🟢 Demat account opening at zero cost😎
🟢 No AMC or platform fees (for life)
🟢 Rs. 0 for Equity, ETF, & IPO delivery
🟢 Rs. 20 or 0.03% (whichever lower) on Equity Intraday & Futures for All Segments
🟢 Rs. 20 on Options for All Segments

Fund Transfer



💵 You can use UPI to fund your trading account at no cost
💵 Transfer funds using Net banking/IMPS to invest in stock market

Gems on Dhan



💎 Earn referral rewards for life once your friends & family start trading
💎 Get 24*7 support from Dhan when you have queries
💎 All of us are involved in resolving your queries, including our CEO 😄
💎 Engage with other users, request features, & do more on the Dhan community

Frequently Asked Questions



1. Is Dhan Safe App to Invest in Share Market?
Dhan is a SEBI-regulated platform & a Depository Participant (DP). You can rely on Dhan to invest in share market. Thousands of others do too.

2. How much time does it take to open demat & activate Dhan account?
You can open demat account in less than 10 minutes! Account activation happens as soon as exchanges approve your KYC.

3. How to transfer shares to Dhan investing app?

1. Register & Login on CDSL Easiest
2. Click on “Transaction” & choose “Setup”
3. Select “Bulk Setup” & “Transaction”
4. Enter “Execution date” “Beneficiary owner ID (BOID)”
5. Tap on “Account ISINs”, choose stock(s), & hit “Submit”
6. Verify the request & select “Commit”
7. Enter your CDSL Easiest PIN

More Questions? Mail us: help@dhan.co

Explore more at: dhan.co

title: Dhan: Online Trading App

creator: Raise Financial Services
descriptionHtml:
🤩 More than 2.5 lakh users love to trade & invest in share market with Dhan! You too can join Dhan and trade stocks online with awesome features. Open your free demat account today in less than 10 minutes #MadeForTrade⚡

🏆 Best-in-Class Stock Trading Solution - Global Fintech 2022
🏆 Most Reliable Tech 2022 - TradingView

This Makes Dhan the Best Online Stock Market Trading Platform

🏅 We listen to our users & ensure that they have access to the best product & customer experience on Dhan app for share trading
🏅 Every feature we release on our stock market app is built for Super Traders & Long-Term Investors

F&O Stocks Trading

🔥 Trade Options & Futures directly from TradingView Charts on Dhan
🔥 Get margin benefit for options buying & selling
🔥 Start trading calls & puts from the Advanced Option Chain

Intraday Trading

🚀 Get 5x leverage for 850+ stocks on our intraday trading platform
🚀 Execute multiple online intraday trading strategies in one go with Basket Orders
🚀 Trade stocks online with one-tap reverse/exit positions

Commodity & Currency Trading

🔥 Use one Dhan account to trade in all segments, including Commodity & Currency
🔥 Instant pledge margin benefit on 1450+ stocks for trading Commodity online
🔥 Trade Commodity & Currency F&O from charts using Dhan’s online trading platform

Investing in Stocks & ETFs

💰 Buy stocks & ETFs for the long term with Zero Brokerage on delivery orders
💰 Mark long-term online investments & get a friendly reminder to reconsider when you try to sell them
💰 4x leverage on 950+ stocks with Margin Funding
💰 Start online investing with daily, weekly, & monthly SIPs

Cool Features for Online Trading

🆕 Enable DDPI to sell your share market holdings quickly without OTP or T-PIN
🆕 For the first time in India - place orders directly from TradingView using Dhan
🆕 Manage risk with Trader’s Control - set alerts for loss & overtrading
🆕 Invite your friends to use the Dhan trading app with a simple QR code scan
😎 Trade in Nifty 50 F&O with real-time stock market live charts
😎 Build on your own with DhanHQ trading APIs
😎 Elevate your online investment experience with Draft Orders, Managed smallcases, & much more
😎 Transfer funds from Dhan investing app to your bank account in minutes!

Pricing

🟢 Demat account opening at zero cost😎
🟢 No AMC or platform fees (for life)
🟢 Rs. 0 for Equity, ETF, & IPO delivery
🟢 Rs. 20 or 0.03% (whichever lower) on Equity Intraday & Futures for All Segments
🟢 Rs. 20 on Options for All Segments

Fund Transfer

💵 You can use UPI to fund your trading account at no cost
💵 Transfer funds using Netbanking/IMPS to invest in stock market

Gems on Dhan

💎 Earn referral rewards for life once your friends & family start trading
💎 Get 24*7 support from Dhan when you have queries
💎 All of us are involved in resolving your queries, including our CEO 😄
💎 Engage with other users, request features, & do more on the Dhan community

Frequently Asked Questions

1. Is Dhan Safe App to Invest in Share Market?
Dhan is a SEBI-regulated platform & a Depository Participant (DP). You can rely on Dhan to invest in share market. Thousands of others do too.

2. How much time does it take to open demat & activate Dhan account?
You can open demat account in less than 10 minutes! Account activation happens as soon as exchanges approve your KYC.

3. How to transfer shares to Dhan investing app?
1. Register & Login on CDSL Easiest
2. Click on “Transaction” & choose “Setup”
3. Select “Bulk Setup” & “Transaction”
4. Enter “Execution date” “Beneficiary owner ID (BOID)”
5. Tap on “Account ISINs”, choose stock(s), & hit “Submit”
6. Verify the request & select “Commit”
7. Enter your CDSL Easiest PIN

More Questions? Mail us: help@dhan.co
Explore more at: dhan.co

title: Dhan: Online Share Market App

creator: Raise Financial Services
descriptionHtml:
🔎 Your search for the best stock market app ends here! 
💯 Open Dhan demat and trading account to access Stocks, Futures, Options, Commodity, Currency, ETFs, and IPO. More than 5 lakh+ users love to trade & invest in the stock market with the Dhan trading app!

Our Share Market App is Built for Super Traders.
Trade Stocks, FnO, Commodity and Currency seamlessly with all the features you need.  P.S. - Most of the below trading features were built based on feedback from our users.

🔥 For Trading
1. 4x Leverage on 950+ Stocks with MTF
2. Direct Trading from Charts powered by TradingView
3. Advanced Option Chain with Greeks
4. Dhan Webhooks for Options Trading from TradingView
5. Forever Order with OCO for Derivatives

 📈 For Charts
1. Trade in Stocks, FnO, Commodity, & Currency
2. Multiple Chart Timeframes (seconds, minutes, & more)
3. Basket Order for Trading Multiple Scrips & Strategies
4. Drag & Drop Orders for Quick Execution
5. 8+ Custom Chart Layouts

 🖥️For Technical Analysis
1. Pivots Levels and Moving Averages
2. 100+ Free Indicators like ADX, MACD, & RSI
3. 15-Minutes Built Up
4. PCR Indicator
5. Drawing Tools (including AWAP)

Our Stock Market App is also Built for the Long Term Investors.
For newcomers in the stock market and those who are already investing in Stocks, ETFs, and Mutual Funds - we are building the best share market investing app for you.

💰For Investing
1. Stock & ETF SIPs
2. Separate Dividend Tracking
3. Direct Mutual Funds - No Commission

🔎 For Analysis
1. All Fundamental & Financials
2. Indicators, Drawing Tools, & Pivot Levels
3. Gainers, Losers, and more filters

🔢 For Portfolio Insights

1. Sector & Industry Based Allocation
2. Invested Watchlist Growth
3. AlphaView - are you beating stock indices?

All of these features are built to enhance your stock market investing and intraday trading experience!

If you are still thinking…
What makes Dhan the best stock market trading app?

We would say...you are our priority, always!

While we adopt a technology-led approach in building our share market trading app, we are equally obsessed with keeping our users happy at all times!

Our customer support team is ready to assist you everywhere, be it demat account opening, trading or investing related queries, money transfer, money withdrawal and more :)

Pricing

🟢 Free demat account😎
🟢 No AMC or platform fees!
🟢 Rs. 0 for Equity, ETF, & IPO delivery
🟢 Rs. 20 or 0.03% (whichever lower) on Equity Intraday & Futures for All Segments
🟢 Rs. 20 on Options for All Segments

Fund Transfer

💵 You can use UPI to fund your trading account
💵 Transfer funds using Net-banking or IMPS

Gems on Dhan

💎 Earn referral rewards for life once your friends & family start trading in share market
💎 Engage with other users, request features, & do more on the Dhan community
💎 All of us are involved in resolving your queries, including our CEO 😄
💎 Get 24*7 support from Dhan when you have queries

FAQs

1. Is it safe to invest with the Dhan stock market app?
Dhan is a SEBI-regulated stock market platform & a Depository Participant (DP). You can rely on Dhan to invest in the stock market. Lacs of others do too💯

2. How much time does it take to open demat account on Dhan?
You can open demat account in less than 10 minutes! Account activation happens as soon as exchanges approve your KYC. Once your KYC is approved you can trade and invest in the stock market instantly!

3. How to transfer shares to the Dhan stock market app?
1. Register & Login on CDSL Easiest
2. Click on “Transaction” & choose “Setup”
3. Select “Bulk Setup” & “Transaction”
4. Enter “Execution date” “Beneficiary owner ID (BOID)”
5. Tap on “Account ISINs”, choose stock(s), & hit “Submit”
6. Verify the request & select “Commit”
7. Enter your CDSL Easiest PIN

More Questions? Mail us: help@dhan.co
Explore more at: dhan.co
